info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 08 at 6:57PM EDT until September 08 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL HERTFORD...SOUTHWESTERN ISLE OF WIGHT AND SOUTHEASTERN SOUTHAMPTON COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF FRANKLIN... At 656 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Courtland, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Franklin, Courtland, and Hunterdale around 700 PM EDT. Sedley around 715 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Sebrell, Sunbeam, Story, and Handsom. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
